title: Welcome

home.title: Welcome,
home.paragraph_1: Thank you for participating in this study which focuses on alphanumeric sequence input on the Internet.
home.paragraph_2:
Your task will be to copy, as quickly as possible and without error, a series of 18 numbers and letters that will be presented to you at the top of your screen.
You will have to copy these numbers and letters into one or more empty fields displayed in the middle of the screen.
home.paragraph_3:
Note that when you finish typing the 18th character, you will automatically move to a short questionnaire that will collect your feedback on how the information was presented and your typing experience.

After this questionnaire, you will move to a new input screen, then again to a short questionnaire... and so on 16 times.

The alphanumeric sequence to be recopied will be different each time (it is randomly generated by the system).
home.paragraph_4:
However, your participation will only take 4-5 minutes.
Before you begin, please fill in some information about your profile...

user_infos.errors_in_form: Please resolve the following points and return the form

sexe.no_answer: I prefer not to say anything
sexe.is_required: Please fill in the field concerning your gender.

age.is_required: Please fill in the field concerning your age.

any_experience.any_experience: Do you ever have to enter alphanumeric information (numbers and letters) on the Internet, such as an ID, an order number, a contract number, etc.?

experience_grade.question: When you have to enter alphanumeric information on the Internet, how would you describe the experience in general?

familirization_page.here_an_example: Here is an example of a screen that will be presented to you.
familirization_page.instructions: Instructions: Please copy, as quickly as possible and without error, the alphanumeric sequence in the empty field(s) below.

experience_beginning.title: Welcome
experience_beginning.start_if_you_are_ready: When you are ready, clic on the "Begin" button.

results.title: Here are the results of your survey:

delete_update_per_chunks_count_graph.xAxis: Number of characters in each chunk

last_screen.contact: For questions about this study, please contact Guillaume Gronier, UX Design Researcher (guillaume.gronier@gmail.com).
